content: the wrong side and right side instructions are inverted for the left wing you start with the wrong side facing you in row 17 outer part flip your work upside down and with the wrong side facing you attach the yarn color e at the sixth stitch row 17-22 same as row 17-22 of the right wing except the wrong side and right side instructions are inverted for the left wing you start with t he wrong side facing you in row 17 finishing touches shaping to improve the shape of the wings we will add some sharp corners attach with yarn d a bit before the top corner of the right wing then do row 1 chain 1 skip 1 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet picot stitch double_crochet 9 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch fasten_off picot picot stitch = chain 3 then slip_stitch into first chain repeat the same at the bottom corner as well as for the left wing embroidery using yarn d embroider some golden details onto the wings following the pictures on the first page of the pattern x bottom wings make 2 note both wings are made in the exact same way but be careful to hide your color changes on the correct side wrong side / right side depending on the wing s orientation left / right inner part in color b chain 6 row 1 starting from second chain from hook sc5 5 row 2 ch1 turn 4sc increase 6 in the next rounds we re going to make some color changes the color of each stitch will be indicated in the text alternatively you can continue crocheting with only yarn b and simply add the color a details with embroidery later row 3 ch1 turn 5sc single_crochet 6 row 4 ch1 turn 2sc 3sc increase 7 row 5 ch1 turn 4sc 3sc 7 row 6 ch1 turn 3sc 3sc increase 8 row 7 ch1 turn 3sc single_crochet single_crochet 3sc 8 row 8 ch1 turn 5sc 2sc increase 9 row 9 ch1 turn 6sc 3sc 9 row 10 ch1 turn single_crochet 7sc increase 10 row 11 ch1 turn 10sc 10 bottom wing row 1 to 27 row 12 ch1 turn 9sc increase 11 row 13 ch1 turn 11sc 11 row 14 ch1 turn 11sc 11 row 15 ch1 turn 11sc 11 row 16 ch1 turn 9sc decrease 10 row 17 ch1 turn 10sc 10 row 18 ch1 turn 8sc decrease 9 row 19 ch1 turn decrease 7sc 8 row 20 ch1 turn decrease 6sc 7 row 21 ch1 turn decrease 5sc 6 row 22 ch1 turn 6sc 6 row 23 ch1 turn single_crochet half_double_crochet 2dc half_double_crochet single_crochet fasten_off 6 row 24 attach yarn color d and single_crochet in back loop only all around fasten_off outer part attach yarn color d at the beginning of row 1 to start crocheting around the wing you will need to flip your work around wrong side facing you for the left wing row 25 ch1 single_crochet until you
